nodes.text: Tythe was a location in the galaxy. At some point after the first battle of the Outer Rim planet Geonosis, which started the Clone Wars between the Confederacy of Independent Systems and Galactic Republic in 22 BBY, Jedi General Anakin Skywalker fought Count Dooku at Tythe. As had occurred during their confrontation on Geonosis and at other locations, Dooku avoided defeat at the hands of Skywalker.

Tythe was mentioned in the 2017 video game Star Wars Battlefront II by the non-player character Dooku as a taunt against the player-controlled Anakin Skywalker. As the taunt only occurs in multi-player matches, which are not bound by timeline restrictions of Star Wars canon, this article does not consider Dooku's speaking of the line to be canonical.

Tythe originated in James Luceno's 2005 Star Wars Legends novel Labyrinth of Evil. In Legends, Tythe was an Outer Rim Territories planet which was the site of a confrontation between Skywalker and Dooku.
